headline.main: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan
headline.print_headline: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan

lead_paragraph: North Korea fired four ballistic missiles into the sea off Japan's northwest coast early on Monday, South Korean and Japanese officials said, days after the reclusive state promised retaliation over U.S.-South Korea military drills it sees as a preparation for war.
